channel.title: Discovery tools on ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Recent content in Discovery tools on ESP3D Ecosystem

item.title: SSDP protocol
item.description: Windows : Supported out of the box, just go to Network page OSX : TBD Linux : On Debian-style distros, install gupnp-tools and run gssdp-discover -i <devicename> --timeout=3 Android : SSDP/UPnP Scanner

item.title: mDNS protocol
item.description: Windows : You may need the bonjour protocol installed on your machine, you can download from here and/or use a dedicated browser like Bonjour browser for Windows OSX : It is supported out of the box but need to use some application like discovery-dns-sd-browser search for esp3d Linux: Avahi service must be installed, check this wiki Android: mdDNS Discovery search for esp3d
